IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: THE PROVISION OF GENERAL AND REHABILITATIVE MEDICAL SERVICES TO THE RESIDENTS OF WESTERN N.C.
IRS990.MissionDescription: THE PROVISION OF GENERAL AND REHABILITATIVE MEDICAL SERVICES TO THE RESIDENTS OF WESTERN N.C.
IRS990.Description: THE HOSPITAL PROVIDES INPATIENT, OUTPATIENT, URGENT, AND EMERGENCY CARE TO THE RESIDENTS OF WESTERN N.C. REGARDLESS OF THEIR SEX, AGE, RACE, NATIONALITY, RELIGION, OR ABILITY TO PAY.

Form990ScheduleHPartIV.DescriptionEntPrimaryActivity: SOLE MEMBER OF BLOWING ROCK HOSPITAL, INCORPORATED

Form990ScheduleHPartVI.BadDebtFootnote: Part III, Line 4: AN ALLOWANCE FOR UNCOLLECTIBLE ACCOUNTS IS RECORDED BASED ON HISTORICAL BAD DEBT EXPERIENCE AND MANAGEMENT'S EVALUATION OF THE ACCOUNTS RECEIVABLE. BALANCES ARE WRITTEN OFF AFTER ALL REASONABLE COLLECTION EFFORTS HAVE BEEN MADE.WE ESTIMATE 5% OF CHARITY COSTS FAIRLY ESTIMATE AMOUNTS INCLUDED AS BAD DEBT THAT WOULD BE ELIGIBLE FOR CHARITY CARE BUT FAILED TO APPLY.
Form990ScheduleHPartVI.DebtCollectionPolicy: Part III, Line 9b: CHARITY WRITE-OFFS ARE SEGREGATED FROM NORMAL BAD DEBTS THROUGH A SEPARATE TRANSACTION CODE. FAMILY INCOME BELOW 175% OF FPG ARE ELIGIBLE FOR 100% WRITE-OFF. PARTIAL WRITE-OFF IS AVAILABLE BETWEEN FAMILY INCOME BETWEEN 175% AND 250% OF FPG.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section A, line 3
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: Parent company, Appalachian Regional Health Care System (ARHS) oversees BRH operations. also note that salaries and other common expenses incurred by ARHS are allocated appropriately to brh and the other entites supported by arhs. this is why salaries expense is reported even though no employees are listed. Officers' compensation is paid out through ARHS. Payments to vendors are paid through ARHS and all 1099's are issued through ARHS.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section A, line 7b
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: Approval may be needed by the parent company, Appalachian Regional Health Care System.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 11
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: The svp/cfo and the system director of finance review the 990 and then it is made available to the board upon completion.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 12c
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: review of policy statement each year.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 15
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: Independent compensation and benefit analysis was performed by Findley Davies in late 2009. The Executive Committee (Compensation Committee) reviewed this information in January, 2010 to establish appropriateness of total compensation, comply with Intermediate Sanction regulations, and determine excutive compensation for CEO, COO, and CFO positions.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, line 19
